initial_reviews.review_title: We use Fortifi to help me an my team meet our SLAs for IT
initial_reviews.review_content:

I like how the SLAs are configurable and that we can change them to be what we want them to and that the SLAs are set in stone with the time requirements that we need to meet.

What do you dislike about Fortifi?
I dislike how there is some ease of life features that arent baked into the SLA agreements. For example if at the weekend we still had a ticket open the timer would still count down and that SLA wont be met if left for too long

initial_reviews.review_title: One stop shop for all your business needs
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Fortifi?
Fortifi is great as a cloud-based platform and an all-in-one place to go for your business's needs. I really like that there are so many things built into the platform which leads to fewer integrations and charges from other vendors. The software seems like it would do a great job scaling from small businesses all the way up to larger-sized companies. Whether you only need a small set of features or every single one, the tools are there for you to be able to take advantage of. The software allows for super simple and incredibly complex tasks to be automated which is a huge time-saver. There is a free trial and a free version of the product which can help to keep costs down for those worried about breaking the bank.

What do you dislike about Fortifi?
I have not had any issues with Fortifi that I would bring up here. I have not used the software for very long and from everything I have experienced first-hand I haven't noticed any issues that would need to be corrected or fixed. This is a testament to how well the company thought out this offering.

Recommendations to others considering Fortifi:
Just like any other software you are considering buying, make sure to do your due diligence and homework to ensure this product is the right one for your needs. It always helps when a company provides a free or lite version of their products for users to "try before you buy" so that way it's apparent whether or not it is worth exploring or not.

What problems is Fortifi solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have been able to solve quite a few different issues with Forifi simply because it offers so many different things. Live Chat is a huge market and one that we are constantly looking to improve. Since our marketing is done in-house it has been great to see what the software is capable of.

initial_reviews.review_title: Enhanced our support processes and made a big impact
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Fortifi?
Before we were using Fortifi, we were trying to track support emails and issues raised with Excel sheets and internal communication methods, which became unmanageable and ineffective. Having tickets automatically created in Fortifi when somebody contacts our support email address now means that everything is easily recorded and tracked, with none of our clients ever accidentally not being replied to.
The use of 'canned responses' for typical resolutions and checks that we can provide our clients also means that our support staff can contact and resolve our client's issues much more efficiently. By using Fortifi, we have been able to further enhance our support service and maintain excellent feedback from our clients.

The Knowledge Base has become a stand out feature of our business and is loved by our growing amount of users around the globe. We are able to easily create sections and articles with a mix of text, image and video content that has enhanced our user's learning journey and increased the speed at which they are able to fully utilise everything our products have to offer. As our products regularly evolve, being able to update our existing content and add more has meant that our Knowledge Base has increased in size. The search tool in the Knowledge Base really comes into power by quickly taking our users to the content they need, but importantly, guiding them to the related content that they didn't realise they needed until the Knowledge Base told them!

What do you dislike about Fortifi?
There are a huge amount of features available, but I don't use them all currently and i'm sure I could benefit from using more.

Recommendations to others considering Fortifi:
Spend time working with the team on integrations and best use of Fortifi, as you will get a lot more out of it.

What problems is Fortifi solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our support processes have been majorly enhanced through using Fortifi. Our customer satisfaction reports have improved and we are better able to track any issues that we need to resolve in our solutions.

all_reviews.review_title: Enhanced our support processes and made a big impact
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Fortifi?
Before we were using Fortifi, we were trying to track support emails and issues raised with Excel sheets and internal communication methods, which became unmanageable and ineffective. Having tickets automatically created in Fortifi when somebody contacts our support email address now means that everything is easily recorded and tracked, with none of our clients ever accidentally not being replied to.
The use of 'canned responses' for typical resolutions and checks that we can provide our clients also means that our support staff can contact and resolve our client's issues much more efficiently. By using Fortifi, we have been able to further enhance our support service and maintain excellent feedback from our clients.

The Knowledge Base has become a stand out feature of our business and is loved by our growing amount of users around the globe. We are able to easily create sections and articles with a mix of text, image and video content that has enhanced our user's learning journey and increased the speed at which they are able to fully utilise everything our products have to offer. As our products regularly evolve, being able to update our existing content and add more has meant that our Knowledge Base has increased in size. The search tool in the Knowledge Base really comes into power by quickly taking our users to the content they need, but importantly, guiding them to the related content that they didn't realise they needed until the Knowledge Base told them!

What do you dislike about Fortifi?
There are a huge amount of features available, but I don't use them all currently and i'm sure I could benefit from using more.

Recommendations to others considering Fortifi:
Spend time working with the team on integrations and best use of Fortifi, as you will get a lot more out of it.

What problems is Fortifi solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our support processes have been majorly enhanced through using Fortifi. Our customer satisfaction reports have improved and we are better able to track any issues that we need to resolve in our solutions.
